page.title: 14An Arable Farm in N.Anston
page.content: Mr.Cavill owns a farm on{Main Street. He owns 22 acres of land.Mr.Cavill's farm was owned by his father who has farmed in{Anston}since 1923.He took over when his father retired in 1978. The farm machines include 2 tractors, 2 trailers,a plough, disc harrow, heavy cultivator,light cultivator, 4 augers (screws for putting grain into bins),4 grain bins,1 fertiliser spreader and 1 roller. Mr.Cavill rents a{combine harvester}and a{seed drill. The combine harvester is stored in Mr.Cavill's Dutch barn. The farm used to be mixed with dairy cattle and pigs.The cowshed was converted into a bunglow for Mr.Cavill's parents when he finished rearing cows in 1970. The farm shed now holds machinery. It used to hold 400 pigs.He finished with pigs in 1978.{Oil seed rape,potatoes}and { {barley}are grown.
